Action.author: heatherp
Action.body: Hi ~Aniket.1 , I've been going through the node sdk backlog with the maintainers - it looks like you found an incorrect link in the fabric-chaincode-node release notes, which we won't be fixing. The correct links are available here: https://hyperledger-fabric.readthedocs.io/en/release-1.4/getting_started.html, so I'm closing this for now.
